verses.name: Genesis 39:4
verses.text: And Joseph found grace in his sight, and he served him: and he made him overseer over his house, and all that he had he put into his hand.

verses.name: Genesis 39:5
verses.text: And it came to pass from the time that he had made him overseer in his house, and over all that he had, that the Lord blessed the Egyptian’s house for Joseph’s sake; and the blessing of the Lord was upon all that he had in the house, and in the field.
